message.content:

Specifically, Linda is an ancestor of Kelly, and through a series of ancestry and descendant relationships involving individuals such as Jason, Susan, Wayne, Thomas, Megan, James, Sara, Heather, Daniel, Jennifer, Roy, Steven, Martha, Walter, George, Jeremy, Hannah, Noah, Eric, Denise, Amanda, Debra, Dennis, Rachel, Andrew, Gary, Virginia, Elizabeth, Gabriel, Ashley, Jean, Alan, Emma, Jacqueline, Carolyn, Ann, Patricia, Donna, Matthew, Henry, David, Margaret, Laura, Amber, Beverly, Christopher, Eugene, Albert, Keith, Evelyn, Brittany, Peter, Anna, Juan, Benjamin, Logan, Joshua, Zachary, Kenneth, Randy, Ryan, Madison, Stephen, Brian, Terry, Rebecca, Theresa, Catherine, Isabella, Jeffrey, Lawrence, Kimberly, Nicholas, Shirley, Sandra, Karen, Janet, Grace, Cheryl, Ralph, Richard, Dorothy, Robert, Jerry, Pamela, Nicole, Kayla, Joyce, Joseph, Abigail, Amy, Christine, Jose, Timothy, Alexis, Charlotte, Teresa, Kyle, Edward, Ruth, Roger, Judy, Alexander, Douglas, Betty, Stephanie, Gerald, Dylan, Jacob, Gregory, Harold, Elijah, Ronald, Bruce, Lauren, Maria, Carl, Angela, Lisa, Adam, Danielle, Marilyn, Charles, Larry, Frank, and finally Diana. This establishes that Linda is an ancestor of Diana, meaning Diana is Linda's descendant.

<ANSWER>4</ANSWER>
